resources.string: A powerful pack of huskies pulling a speeding dogsled and musher along a snow-packed trail: it’s the quintessential Alaska adventure and one that often fuels the daydreams of travelers. It doesn’t have to be winter to drive a dog sled in Alaska. Get a taste of the one of the north’s greatest adventures in summer too! Summer sun and winter fun unite for a doggone good time.
Select a date for Dog Sledding
